name: Sherry Christian
text: I love passing by this landmark as it reminds me Jesus is always watching over me

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. Jesus is our Good Shepherd. Thankful.

name: Benny Martin
text: The Lord is my Shepherd.  Psalm 23.  Samantha community icon. by Johnny Williamson

name: Aprille Smalley
text: Very giving an caring to our community

resp.text: Thank you Aprille for our kind words.

name: Robert Heyward
text: Beautiful war memorial to the early citizens of the county.  Dedicated in 1910!

name: Robert Heyward
text: Nice memorial to the early citizens of the county asked by their government to defend their homes and families.

name: Sandra Michalski
text:
I paid cash for my husband's headstone, upright and a bench'--EIGHT MONTHS ago!! I am still waiting for the bench!! These people take your money and then don't deliver. No one returns your calls with answers or an update.
I REGRET placing my husband in the trust of these people. You should think twice before doing the same with your loved one.

resp.text: Ms. Michalski, we are so sorry to hear about your issues and  will call you to discuss.  We pride ourselves in taking care of families on the worst day of their lives. We sincerely apologize if we have added to your burden.

name: Greg Hollis
text: As a funeral director from Montgomery, I found this cemetery to be well kept and the staff courteous from greeting to goodbye. Shawna Mayo's empathy and professionalism were the perfect mix for taking care of my family.

resp.text: Thank you for the good review Greg, we really appreciate it.

name: Samanth Hodgson
text: Always clean, and well manicured. Nice calm vibes.

resp.text: Samanth, we appreciate the wonderful review!

name: Lera Seals
text: I did a direct internment and the service I received was outstanding.  The Director and Felecia Cook my counselor were so caring, compassionate, they really listen and provide options.  I was especially grateful they helped me find a final resting place for my daughter that worked for me and my circumstances.

resp.text: Lera, thank you so much for your kind words. We are honored to be of service.

name: Greyson Whatley
text:
The GPS site says it closes at 4pm on Sunday, we called and were told it closed at 6pm, and the sign says it closes at 7pm?

On the other hand, it’s awesome and our daughter-in-law is beside the lake where it’s beyond awesome!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Greyson, for the feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience and will get this updated.

name: Rev. BOSS
text: Well kept place. The sunsets are magnificent.

resp.text: Thank you, The Bearded Truth! We really appreciate the great feedback.

name: Katherine McGlothren
text: My father has been buried there  for almost 25 years and it's just as beautiful today as it was then. It's such a quiet and tranquil Place to be .

resp.text: Thank you for trusting your loved one in our care, Katherine. We really appreciate the kind words.
Thank you, Ria, for your review and rating! We really appreciate the kind words.

name: Richard Lynch
text: My Wife has been there since Sept of 2006. I still miss Her.

resp.text: Richard, thank you for trusting us with your loved one. We appreciate your review.
Thank you so much for the great review! We are glad that you enjoyed the gardens.
Angie, thank you so much for the kind words.

name: Aaron “Dabz” Cargile
text: They helped me find the perfect headstone for my mother.

name: Randy Moore
text: Very good owner really nice person and very honest
